title: New: Cities Aviv – Normal Immortal
body:
There’s cloud rap, and then there’s this shit.

The new cut from Memphis MC, **[Cities Aviv](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/14684-new-cities-aviv-flex-your-gold/ "New: Cities Aviv – Flex Your Gold")**, is a far hazier experience than we’ve come to expect, (even by his standards), but it’s a welcome experiment and an exciting point to what could be a more experimental sonic direction.

excerpt.full: There’s cloud rap, and then there’s this shit. The new cut from Memphis MC, Cities Aviv, is a far hazier experience than we’ve come to expect, (even by his standards), but it’s a welcome experiment and an exciting point to what could be a more experimental sonic direction.
excerpt.short: There’s cloud rap, and then there’s this shit.
